Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] A smooth \$(this.trait:material) band that twists at the front to take the shape of an eternal\{? \| \$(this.trait:gem:material) \| \$(this.trait:gem:color) \$(this.trait:gem:material)-adorned\} loop. \{? \| \$(this.trait:gem:material) \|A large \$(this.trait:gem:color) \$(this.trait:gem:shape) \$(this.trait:gem:material) is set at the very center where the twist of the eternity symbol overlaps.\}\{? \| \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) \| Miniscule \$(this.trait:gempieces:color) \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) gemstones have been inset along the figure-8 shape of the eternity symbol. \}

X[S] A smooth \$(this.trait:material) band that twists at the front to take the shape of an eternal\{? \| \$(this.trait:gem:material) \| \$(this.trait:gem:color) \$(this.trait:gem:material)-adorned\} loop. \{? \| \$(this.trait:gem:material) \|A large \$(this.trait:gem:color) \$(this.trait:gem:shape) \$(this.trait:gem:material) is set at the very center where the twist of the eternity symbol overlaps.\}\{? \| \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) \| Miniscule \$(this.trait:gempieces:color) \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) gemstones have been inset along the figure-8 shape of the eternity symbol. \}
